channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Royal Makeover
channel.desc: When Ramone discovers he is the heir to San Pablo, royal expert Angelica is hired to turn him into a suitable king. Has he finally found his queen.

channel.title: A Bridesmaid In Love
channel.desc: When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love On Your Doorstep
channel.desc: Love starts to bloom between a talented TV host and a florist with a groundbreaking flower delivery app as they work on a new, primetime TV show.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Engagement Back-Up
channel.desc: Historian Luna must pretend to be engaged to a tech mogul's son to rescue her late father's naval museum. But could their make-believe love turn into something more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Return To Office
channel.desc: After making the return to the office on a hybrid schedule, two co-workers spark up an office romance after sending flirty notes to each other.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love Hacks
channel.desc: Relationship coach Sam believes she can fix any romance and she's creating a podcast to prove it. But then producer Josh poses some unexpected hurdles.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet On You
channel.desc: Small-town pie shop owner Kate meets city boy Drew, who plans to tear down her business to build a neighbourhood of new homes. Can her love - and her pies - win him over.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Styled With Love
channel.desc: Working together could put a budding personal stylist and an aspiring travel photographer on a path to their dream jobs, but will they lose their hearts along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Magic of Lemon Drops
channel.desc: When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had lived her unfulfilled dreams.

channel.desc: A booking mix-up turns Samara's birthday getaway into a week-long journey where she and her friends rediscover their passions, purpose and love lives.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sealed With A List
channel.desc: This holiday season, Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Love Subscription
channel.desc: Businesswoman Lily must get over her differences with a love-focused company's CEO if she wants to turn his start-up into a thriving business.

channel.title: Autumn at Apple Hill
